newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippines says Friday, June 13 a working day.
newsitem.headline: Philippines says Friday, June 13 a working day.

text.p: The presidential palace said in an official announcement that Friday, June 13 is a working day.
The announcement on Wednesday by Executive Secretary Ruben Torres was in response to speculation the government might declare Friday a holiday to ensure a long weekend.
Thursday has been declared a holiday for the Philippine Independence Day.
